title: just why
body: season 4 I had 400 plus ranked games with alistar and I was In silver 4. season 5 has reset everything including my record of how many games ive played and resetting me qualifying what division I should be in. I played 10 ranked games so I could be put in a division. I won 5 out of 10 and got put in bronze one. I  remember I won the exact same amount of times in season 4 and I got put into silver 3. I'm playing with people who are just a bit under skilled than I am and I always seem to be on the losing team most of the time. I do well most of the time in my lane but the other 2 lanes tend to always not do so good which is fine but it happens nearly every game to me, I get matched with people who aren't the same skill level as I am. its near Impossible to get back to silver 4 because of this season 5 and everything it reset. its just straight up annoying. I'm probably just another guy with a common complaint but I cant help but feel neglected

replies.body:
They made some changes to this system I believe, making it more difficult to get into a higher division/rank. Including how well you do in the games I think.

Your Rank from Season 4:
Silver 4

S5 Provisional Matches:

10/10 = Gold 4+ 
9/10 = Gold 4/5
8/10 = Silver 1/Gold 5
7/10 = Silver 2
6/10 = Your rank from the previous season (Silver 4)
5/10 = Bronze 1/2
4/10 = Bronze 3/4

Any less games won, you will probably be put in Bronze 5
If you aren't winning at least 6 out of 10 games you'll most likely drop 3 or more divisions.

yeah it seems that's exactly what they have done. but its still unfair is what I think personally. would you not agree that riot should be a bit lenient and seen that I was in silver 4 and now I need to work my way back up again?
